texts.label: paragraph
texts.orig: I stumbled upon a server running Plesk 8.2.1 where a certain user could not receive e-mail. I sent an e-mail to the user from my mail client, and I never saw it enter the user's mailbox. It didn't even appear in the logs.
texts.text: I stumbled upon a server running Plesk 8.2.1 where a certain user could not receive e-mail. I sent an e-mail to the user from my mail client, and I never saw it enter the user's mailbox. It didn't even appear in the logs.

texts.label: paragraph
texts.orig: After checking the usual suspects, like MX records, mail account configuration, and firewalls, I was unable to find out why it was occurring. Even after a run of
texts.text: After checking the usual suspects, like MX records, mail account configuration, and firewalls, I was unable to find out why it was occurring. Even after a run of

texts.label: paragraph
texts.orig: , the emails would not be delivered.
texts.text: , the emails would not be delivered.

texts.label: paragraph
texts.orig: I began testing with a telnet connection to the SMTP port:
texts.text: I began testing with a telnet connection to the SMTP port:

texts.label: code
texts.orig:
$ telnet 11.22.33.44 25
Trying 11.22.33.44...
Connected to 11.22.33.44.
Escape character is '^]'.
220 www.yourserver.com ESMTP
HELO domain.com
250 www.yourserver.com
MAIL FROM: test@test.com
250 ok
RCPT TO: someuser@somedomain.com
421 temporary envelope failure (#4.3.0)
QUIT
221 www.yourserver.com
Connection closed by foreign host.
texts.text:
$ telnet 11.22.33.44 25
Trying 11.22.33.44...
Connected to 11.22.33.44.
Escape character is '^]'.
220 www.yourserver.com ESMTP
HELO domain.com
250 www.yourserver.com
MAIL FROM: test@test.com
250 ok
RCPT TO: someuser@somedomain.com
421 temporary envelope failure (#4.3.0)
QUIT
221 www.yourserver.com
Connection closed by foreign host.

texts.label: paragraph
texts.orig: Temporary envelope failure? I was still confused. After reviewing the logs, I found the following line whenever I tried to telnet to port 25 and send an e-mail:
texts.text: Temporary envelope failure? I was still confused. After reviewing the logs, I found the following line whenever I tried to telnet to port 25 and send an e-mail:

texts.label: paragraph
texts.orig: It turns out that the customer was using greylisting in qmail with qmail-envelope-scanner. After a quick check of /tmp/greylist_dbg.txt, I found the entries from me (as well as a lot of other senders), and that ended up being the root of the problem.
texts.text: It turns out that the customer was using greylisting in qmail with qmail-envelope-scanner. After a quick check of /tmp/greylist_dbg.txt, I found the entries from me (as well as a lot of other senders), and that ended up being the root of the problem.
